definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Then they discovered that the directivity of the magnet.
sentences.chinese: 後來又發現了磁石的指向性。

sentences.english: Placing iron next to a magnet will magnetize the iron.
sentences.chinese: 將鐵放在磁石的旁邊，鐵將會被磁化。

sentences.english: Every single word and phrase is magnetizing my soul.
sentences.chinese: 你的每一字一句如磁石般吸引我的靈魂。

sentences.english: Magnets have great attractive power for iron.
sentences.chinese: 磁石對鐵有很強的吸引力。

sentences.english: If the magnet or rubber rings are broken, please replace the spare parts.
sentences.chinese: 磁石或橡膠圈如有破損，請及時更換備用配件。

sentences.english: Love is the loadstone of love.
A clean (and dry) set of BDU's is a magnet for mud and rain.
sentences.chinese: 乾淨的野戰制服是招引泥漿與雨水的磁石。

sentences.english: A kindly tongue is the lodestone of the hearts of men.
sentences.chinese: 和言善語乃是人心的磁石。

sentences.english: The earth may be thought of as a gigantic magnet.
sentences.chinese: 整個地球可以想像爲一塊碩大無朋的磁石。

sentences.english: The earth may be thought of as a gigantic magnet.
sentences.chinese: 整個地球可看作是一塊碩大無朋的磁石。

sentences.english: Diligence is a kind of can attract the lodestone of every good thing.
sentences.chinese: 勤奮是一種可以吸引一切美好事物的天然磁石。

sentences.english: Mercury attracts gold like a magnet.
sentences.chinese: 水銀像磁石一樣吸引這金子。

sentences.english: Certain metals are attracted to a magnet.
sentences.chinese: 某些金屬受磁石的吸引。

sentences.english: You can magnetize a needle by rubbing it with a magnet.
sentences.chinese: 將針與磁石摩擦就可以將其磁化。

sentences.english: Helena : You draw me, you hard-hearted adamant.
sentences.chinese: 是你吸引我的，你這硬心腸的磁石。

sentences.english: Love is the lodestone of life.

definition: a magnet/same as 磁鐵|磁铁
to draw (towards)/to be drawn to/to be sucked in
mutual attraction (e.g. electrostatic)/to attract one another
mother-of-pearl (used in ornamentation and in TCM)
mutual repulsion (e.g. electrostatic)/to repel one another
